Product Title: EltaMD Skin Recovery Essence Hydrating Toner for Face, Face Toner for Oily Skin and Sensitive Skin, Alcohol Free Formula, Helps Detoxify and Hydrate Skin, pH Balanced, Oil Free, 7.3 oz Bottle

Average Rating: 4.6

See more', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Professional Skin Care', 'Product Dimensions': '1.19 x 1.19 x 6.31 inches; 7.3 Ounces', 'Item model number': '090205077518', 'UPC': '090205077518', 'Manufacturer': 'EltaMD', 'Country of Origin': 'USA'}
Review Text: This is a nice toner. It gently tones the skin after cleansing. It leaves my skin feeling soft and moisturized, not tight or dry. I'm looking forward to using it more along with other products from Elta MD. It feels gentle on my skin, which is especially nice as it gets drier during the winter months. The bottle is a nice large size as well, so it is a good value.
Review Title: Soothes my skin
Rating: 5.0

reference_summary:
C.O. Bigelow No. 007 Dr Hiosous Quince Hand Lotion, 4 Ounces
C. O. Bigelow
{'Brand': 'C. O. Bigelow', 'Item Form': 'Lotion', 'Unit Count': '4 Ounce', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Use for': 'Hands', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '6.6 x 2 x 0.7 inches; 5.61 Ounces', 'Item model number': '20002240'}
This is a nice hand cream. The tube is a generous size. I've used C.O. Bigelow products in the past and have always enjoyed them so I was interested in trying this hand cream. It's very moisturizing! I usually use it after washing my hands or if I wake up in the night with dry hands from air conditioning. It's not so thick that it's hard to get out of the tube, and it's not very greasy, but still feels really good and moisturizing, taking a minute to really absorb. The smell is great! I wasn't really familiar with the scent of quince before. All I knew about it was that it was a fruit. The smell is really nice, I don't even know how to describe it! Subtly fruity, maybe a little spicy too, definitely enjoyable! This is a great product and will last a long time.
Lovely!

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preference:** Strong inclination towards moisturizing hand lotions and hydrating facial products, valuing effectiveness, comfort, and pleasant scents.
- **Brand Loyalty:** Established preference for C.O. Bigelow and positive experiences with EltaMD, indicating a willingness to explore new brands that align with their skincare needs.
- **Texture Preference:** Appreciates lotions and toners that are not overly thick or greasy, favoring products that absorb well and leave skin feeling soft and hydrated without residue.
- **Usage Habits:** Regularly utilizes hand creams and facial toners, particularly after cleansing or in response to dryness from environmental factors, particularly during colder months.
- **Fragrance Appreciation:** Enjoys subtly fruity and unique scents, with a growing interest in exploring diverse fragrances in both hand and facial care products.
- **Overall Sentiment:** Tends to rate products highly, emphasizing quality, personal experience, and the soothing benefits for skin, especially for sensitive or dry skin.

This user demonstrates a consistent appreciation for effective skincare solutions that prioritize comfort, hydration, and a gentle application, showcasing a commitment to both hand and facial care regimens.
